thread.title: Putin Exposes Obama’s Disturbing Connection To ISIS -Video | Obama
thread.title_full: Putin Exposes Obama’s Disturbing Connection To ISIS -Video | Obama

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Putin Exposes Obama’s Disturbing Connection To ISIS -Video | Obama
text:
(Before It's News)
 by Jimmy Ward Thanks for sending Billy – forwarding to all.
Quote: from the article:
Russian President Vlademir Putin has absolutely no respect for Barack Obama, and in this disturbing video, he reveals one of the reasons why…
According to Top Right News , Putin drops a bombshell in this video when he reveals that Obama is actually FUNDING ISIS. Suddenly, all of Obama’s bizarre behavior to help Muslims makes sense…
Not that I give credence or trust for any Russian official, but Putin is right on many levels in this video. What I don’t understand is why it takes the testimony of a professional Politburo pinko to make the article author, or ANYONE, think that “Suddenly, all of Obama’s bizarre behavior to help Muslims makes sense.”
Really???? I reckon his seven years of OBVIOUS BEHAVIOR, loyalty toward the Muslim Brotherhood, and ALL OF THE ISLAMIC WORLD didn’t make any sense before. Now suddenly it does???
The only thing “bizarre” at this stage of the White House mosqued Presidency of Obamalek is that not enough Americans, especially political pundits, actually acknowledge that we have a Muslim Mole in the Oval Office. When they FINALLY do that, they’ll understand ALL OF HIS BIZARRE BEHAVIOR.
Makes a feller want to hit the hard stuff early and give himself a root canal.
JW
See original article here:
http://mrconservative.com/2015/10/65135-breaking-putin-exposes-obamas-disturbing-connection-to-isis/
